ygData.subject: Upcoming Council Election
ygData.msgSnippet: It s that time again, the council elections are coming up soon, and we d like people to tell us if they re running or not. We ve changed the way this will run

Subject: Upcoming Council Election
Message-ID: <3B363A5A.21020.46F8673@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>

It's that time again, the council elections are coming up soon, and 
we'd like people to tell us if they're running or not. We've changed 
the way this will run a little from last election, but it about 90% the 
same. The new council will come into effect July 2, two months 
after the first election. We require the following things from 
canidates and supporters:

1) If you wish to run:
	You must find three people who support your running for 		
	council.

2) Email the council with those three supporters. Copy-paste the 	
	following into the send field: 

rauq@..., yanshosh@..., TMRattrap@..., 
Alloran2@...

3) Make sure the people who you mark down as supporters email 
	the council as well saying that they support you, and anyone 	
	else that they are supporting.

4) If you're running, you can only support two people. If you're not 	
	running, you can support three people.

5) If you send $20 to each current council member, we will hook 	
	you up. =) (wellll, maybe not... but please do send us 			
	money!)

A slight difference from last election. This time we will elect two 
new council members (instead of three). One council memeber 
(other than Yanshosh) will remain on the council. That member will 
be chosen through a second poll. 


	~NBWRPG Council
